message.content:
cs.IR, cs.DL, cs.SI, cs.CL, cs.DB 

The paper is about academic literature retrieval, which is a subfield of information retrieval (IR) and digital libraries (DL). The paper also utilizes natural language processing (NLP) techniques to analyze the content of academic papers, which is a subfield of computational linguistics (CL). The paper mentions the use of citation information, which is a subfield of network science (SI) and databases (DB). Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.IR, cs.DL, cs.SI, cs.CL, and cs.DB.
